scenario: Missed class
Overslept
I missed the team meeting due to internet issues
excuse: Unfortunately, I was unable to attend the team meeting today due to internet issues. My connection kept dropping and I wasn't able to access the virtual platform. Despite my best efforts, I couldn't get it working in time for the meeting.

scenario: I missed the team meeting due to internet issues

scenario: I missed the team meeting due to internet issues
excuse: Unfortunately, I was unable to attend the team meeting today due to internet issues that prevented me from logging in and participating via video conference.
